title: The After Show Details What We’re Smoking During the Pandemic
itunes:title: The After Show Details What We’re Smoking During the Pandemic
description:
This week, we talk about what we’re smoking while the pandemic rages around us. Are we smoking the same old thing or something different?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
